channel.title: Problem with new items
channel.description:
Can someone help me please?
I use project czar. Like anyone knows, project czar got "some" glitches. And one of then all is the mouth glitch(makes your beard looks bugged). I fixed that one with the help of a guy at tutorial section BUT I added new things... Like elegant top, bandos top, elegant legs, etc. And they came glitched. With some fails at the item when you wear. Can some1 tell me how to fix? I think thats on item.java, but tried a lot to fix and didnt worked. Thanks. :)

item.title: Problem with new items
item.dc:creator: @hah_bah_gee hah bah gee
item.description:
@hah_bah_gee wrote:

You gotta go into the items.cfg and add the line of code for whatever item you wish to add:

like bandos boots would be added as:

item = 15350	Bandos boots	A silabsoft Item	100	100	100	0	0	0	-5	-3	17	18	19	0	0	0	1	0	0	0

Read full topic

item.title: Problem with new items
item.dc:creator: @caponescape caponescape
item.description:
@caponescape wrote:

i got the same problem, i already added the items in item4.java and they go in the right slot BUT they looked all messed up with holes and stuff, please help!

Read full topic

its named bad english…
but w/e…
just put then at item4.java doesnt work >>
im not idiot… im here becuz i really got a problem >>
can someone HELP me now?

item.title: Problem with new items

I added new things… Like elegant top, bandos top, elegant legs, etc.
And they came glitched. WITH SOME FAILS AT THE ITEM WHEN YOU WEAR.
Can some1 tell me how to fix? I think thats on item.java, but tried a lot to fix and didnt worked.
Thanks. :)[/quote]
Read that Hippie. I’m on quick reply but look at the part I capped. He spelled a bit wrong but whatever. 200 rep moparscaper gets it wrong XD.

Read full topic

item.title: Problem with new items
item.dc:creator: @hippie hippie
item.description:
@hippie wrote:

n0va k0:

lol, project czar isn’t glitched because of that. Just go to item4.java and add the id’s of the items to the right equipment slot.

Not even closely related.

So are you saying things like hoods and helms that show your face have this issue?

Read full topic
